document_data.name: ''Bag of Wind''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bags of wind''''' were [[enchanted]] bundles of cloth or bags that contained trapped wind inside.
document_data.Powers: Each bag held three uses and upon being opened, unleashed a powerful ''[[gust of wind]]'' that could knock the user's opponents off their feet.
document_data.History: ''Bags of wind'' received some use in the late 14{{th}} century in the kingdom of [[Cormyr]], found in settlements of [[Hultail]], [[Morfen]], [[Polter's Fort]], and [[Thunderstone]].
